players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Bob.
The villager Bob was found dead.
Beware, Charlie is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Bob was killed, so he was not mafia. I think Charlie is mafia."
You: remained silent.
Charlie: "I investigated Alice and found she is mafia. Bob was killed, so not mafia. I'm the detective, not mafia. Vote Alice."
Diana: "Charlie, you claimed to be detective but you said Alice is mafia. That means you are mafia. Vote Charlie."
Charlie: "I am the detective, not mafia. I investigated Alice and found her mafia. Bob was killed, so not mafia. Diana, you misread my role. Vote Alice."
You: "I think Charlie is mafia because he is the only one who knows about Bob's death."

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Bob was found dead.
You investigated Alice and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Alice knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Bob was killed, so he was not mafia. I think Charlie is mafia."
Alice: remained silent.
You: "I investigated Alice and found she is mafia. Bob was killed, so not mafia. I'm the detective, not mafia. Vote Alice."
Diana: "Charlie, you claimed to be detective but you said Alice is mafia. That means you are mafia. Vote Charlie."
You: "I am the detective, not mafia. I investigated Alice and found her mafia. Bob was killed, so not mafia. Diana, you misread my role. Vote Alice."
Alice: "I think Charlie is mafia because he is the only one who knows about Bob's death."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice, Diana voted for Alice (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
Alice was arrested
